description: Growth function of an infinite cubic graph (no of nodes at distance <=n from fixed node).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1,2,-4,2,-1,2,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x + 1) (2 x^8 - 4 x^7 + 3 x^6 - x^5 + 6 x^4 + 2 x^3 + 2 x^2 + x + 1)/((x - 1)^4 (x^2 + x + 1)^2), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2013 *)
author: Jan Kristian Haugland (jankrihau(AT)hotmail.com)
